about.title: Discover Samarkand with Us
about.description: Welcome to GoToSamarkand – your gateway to the ancient city of Samarkand, where history and culture come alive. Our platform offers a wide range of guided tours tailored to your interests, from architectural marvels to vibrant local markets. Explore the heart of Central Asia through curated photo galleries, detailed descriptions, and real-time updates about upcoming cultural events and festivals. Our user-friendly services make it easy to plan and book your visit, whether you’re traveling solo, as a couple, or with a group. Each tour is led by experienced guides who share fascinating stories and hidden gems of the city. Discover the Registan, the Shah-i-Zinda necropolis, and traditional Uzbek craftsmanship. Through our event calendar and virtual galleries, you’ll stay connected to the spirit of Samarkand. With GoToSamarkand, every trip becomes a journey into the soul of one of the oldest cities on earth.

servic.title: Services

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Samarkand is a city that captivates hearts with its ancient history, elegant architecture, musical streets, friendly people, colorful bazaars, and the magical nights of Registan Square.

event.title: Events
event.description: Discover unforgettable events including cultural festivals, historical tours, music nights, and local exhibitions held across the city.

tour.title: Popular Tours
tour.description: Unforgettable journeys filled with history, culture, and stunning sights.
tour.descriptionAll: Embark on a journey to Samarkand — a city where history and modern life blend seamlessly. Our tours include visits to the majestic Registan, the sacred Shohi Zinda complex, the Bibi Khanum Mausoleum, and Ulugh Beg’s ancient observatory. Experience the beauty of Islamic architecture, the legacy of the Silk Road, and the warmth of Uzbek hospitality. We offer guided excursions, transfers, photo sessions, and culinary workshops. Discover the culture, history, and flavors of Samarkand in a single unforgettable adventure that will stay with you forever.
